post.body: enjoying the simpler things...but also think some of the complex things r pretty cool. like the microchip u swallow to monitor ur health
I`ve been thinking about this recession. Our crisis isn`t a financial one, but a moral one. Bailouts won`t help, self realization will
trying to sleep on an air mattress...uguh
visiting pops up in philly. I wonder if people will be traveling a lot today or if traffic won't be that bad...

I'm going to be the only one in all of Washington DC in the office today :(
enjoying the final hours of Christmas with Mrs. A
